name: FTSOCAN
description: Start building passive income with FTSO Canada today!
general: FTSO Canada is your partner to help you build your passive income on the Flare Network, by providing the Flare Network with a fast and efficient price provider. FTSOCAN is also behind the Flare Linux project, a computer environment that makes deploying FLR and SGB nodes really simple on any computer/OS.
availability: We are a high-availability price provider, and validator, with very constant uptimes of 99.99%+.
